title: Release-All executor
description: Release all projects in the workspace that have a release target configured

version.description: Version to release for all projects (e.g. '1.0.0', 'patch', 'minor', 'major')

dryRun.description: Preview the release without making any changes

releaseAs.description: Release as a specific version type for all projects

publish.description: Whether to publish packages after release

registry.description: Registry URL to publish to (npm, nexus, or custom registry)

registryType.description: Type of registry to publish to

onlyChanged.description: Only release projects that have been affected by changes
